import React from 'react' import './Cards.css' import { useEffect,useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import like_ico from '../images/like.png' import eye_ico from '../images/eye.png' import img1 from '../images/img1.png' import img2 from '../images/img2.png' import img3 from '../images/img3.png' import img4 from '../images/img4.png' const Cards =()=> { const [cardData,setCardData] = useState([]) useEffect(async ()=>{ await axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/home/') .then( res =>{ setCardData(res.data.videos_data) console.log(res.data); }) .catch( err =>{ console.log(err); }) }, []) return (

Our Creations

{cardData.slice(0, 5).map(e =>

{e.title}

{e.views} Views

{e.likes} Likes

)}

MORE
) } export default Cards
